table_description: A region in DigitalOcean represents a datacenter where Droplets can be deployed and images can be transferred. Each region represents a specific datacenter in a geographic location. Some geographical locations may have multiple \"regions\" available. This means that there are multiple datacenters available within that area.

columns.name: slug
columns.description: A human-readable string that is used as a unique identifier for each region.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The display name of the region. This will be a full name that is used in the control panel and other interfaces.

columns.name: available
columns.description: This is a boolean value that represents whether new Droplets can be created in this region.

columns.name: features
columns.description: This attribute is set to an array which contains features available in this region.

columns.name: sizes
columns.description: This attribute is set to an array which contains the identifying slugs for the sizes available in this region.
